name: Circuit Claws
description: Circuit Claws is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES Club. With its shiny black box body and cat-shaped buttons, it has a sleek and modern design. Its arms and legs are also cat-themed, adding to its aesthetic appeal. The screen on Circuit Claws displays a mesmerizing snake pattern, capturing the attention of anyone who gazes upon it. Additionally, it is equipped with a helmet add-on, providing extra protection and functionality. As a member of the WebtrES Club, Circuit Claws is well-versed in web technologies and constantly explores the digital realm. It is a reliable companion in the world of coding and electronics.
